page.title: 16GLEN TORRIDON CRAFTS
page.content: There is a small pottery in Torridon, next to the potter's house.The potters make the pottery then sell it to the local shop and to other craft shops. The pottery,which is mostly hand made and hand painted,is dishes,pots,vases, ornaments,lamps and bowls.Some of the people in the area buy the goods: tourists and visitors also buy it as attractive souvenirs of their stay. The small work shop has electric fired kilns,two electric and one foot driven wheel and an electric clay pug.The pots have to be fired three times. Painting and finishing is all hand done.There is also woodwork equipment as wooden goods are sometimes made too At one time wrought iron work was also done,but is not done so much now. This is the only commercial craft work done in this area,though other crafts are done in nearby villages.
